column4: Does anyone have some tips on getting all of the buttons on a logitech S530 (detected as an s510) mouse (keyboard mostly works) to work properly? Using 10.04 A3, however I am fairly sure its an issue with all versions, as I have yet to find any substantial information on how to make it work
USB overdrive, if you donÂ´t mind paying.
